hackathon-description-text: Tecmihacks is a hackathon where students can participate whether or not they have participated in a previous hackathons. We provide a safe environment where you can focus on your projects, get help form experts and even earn prizes.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Founder at Innku and Reservamos.mx. Hacker at Hackerschool.mx.
Co-founder at boletia.com, skydrop.com.mx, shipkraken.com His proyects have raised various MM USD from national and foreign fundings.
Security Specialist. Privacy, network security, risk and compliance at Steelcase Inc.
Founder at AcidStudios and mobile Developer.
Research and system developing subdirector at Banorte.

hackathon-eligibility: Only students or hackers who havent been graduated for longer than a year.
hackathon-requirements: It's important to provide a link to the source code, a presentation of your project and a link to your working project.
hackathon-rules:
You mush follow MLH's 
.
It's also forbidden to bring any kind of alcoholic beverage, drugs, sharp objects, firearms. Smoking inside the campus is also forbidden, take care of teh facilities and respect your fellow hackers.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First, second and third place overall winner medals will be awarded to each member in the team.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 50% discount on any national round trip for each member of the team (Mexico)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Paseo del Acueducto 2610, Sin Nombre de Col 39, 64909 Monterrey, N.L., Mexico

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How complex was the hack used for the project
How good and profesional does the project looks in general
Is the project functional enough to be ued as an MVP.
How much did you learn during this project

hackathon-location-address: Paseo del Acueducto 2610, Sin Nombre de Col 39, 64909 Monterrey, N.L., Mexico
hackathon-description-header: Organized by students at Tecmilenio University 2017
